title: India cuts internet and mobile phone service in Kashmir after separatist leader Syed Ali Shah Gilani dies
content:
1. India cuts internet and mobile phone service in Kashmir after separatist leader Syed Ali Shah Gilani dies  The Washington Post
  2. India locks down Kashmir after quiet burial of separatist Geelani  Al Jazeera English
  3. Internet shut down and Indian troops deployed after death of Kashmir separatist leader  CNN
  4. Syed Ali Shah Geelani: Why was he influential in Kashmir?  Gulf News
  5. With SAS Geelani’s death, separatism orphaned and Pakistan loses biggest asset in Kashmir  ThePrint
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: インド、カシミール地方でインターネットと携帯電話のサービスを停止。
分离主义领导人赛义德-阿里-沙阿-吉拉尼去世后，印度切断了克什米尔地区的互联网和移动电话服务
分離主義領導人賽義德-阿里-沙阿-吉拉尼去世後，印度切斷了克什米爾地區的互聯網和移動電話服務
